amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Operation and Maintenance by $1 million and reduces funding for Departmental Administration by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Operation and Maintenance by $1 million and to reduce funding for Departmental Administration by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cassidy amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cassidy amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Cassidy.
